DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Collection Group Collection Status SpecimenCollectionGroupCollectionStatus
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:The act of gathering things together.:Any number of entities (members) considered as a unit._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:A condition or state at a particular time._The status of specimen collection group as to whether it is collected or pending

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:The act of gathering things together.:Any number of entities (members) considered as a unit._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.
Any number of entities (members) considered as a unit.
